abstract: New Jersey Devils center Jacob Josefson breaks his right clavicle during first period of team's 4-3 loss to San Jose Sharks.
snippet: Center Jacob Josefson broke his right clavicle crashing into the end boards in the first period of the host Devils’ 4-3 shootout loss to the San Jose Sharks.
lead_paragraph: Center Jacob Josefson broke his right clavicle crashing into the end boards in the first period of the host Devils’ 4-3 shootout loss to the San Jose Sharks.
